string.text: Shows the total amount of ammo you have for all types of your actual weapon availables in your inventory. (Traffic Signals Colors : Green --> Good Ammo -- Orange --> Bad Ammo -- Red --> Very Bad Ammo)
Adds Old Ammo Counters(works only if B.G.A.C is actived)
Makes the Old Ammo appear in ORANGE color(only when you have no good ammo in the ammo type)
Adds Very Old Ammo Counters(works only if B.G.A.C is actived)
Makes the Very Old Ammo appear in RED color (only when you have no good ammo and no bad ammo in the ammo type, so a RED zero will appear because Anomaly 1.5.1 do not use very old ammo)
Orange default anomaly colors for ammo counters

Deactivate the BGAC default colors (Traffic Signals Colors : Green --> Good Ammo -- Orange --> Bad Ammo -- Red --> Very Bad Ammo) to activate Default Anomaly Orange colors from darker (Good Ammo) to lighter (Very Bad Ammo)
